description:
The ICL ZoneKnit™ Insulated Knit Bomber is a reimagining of the classic bomber-style jacket that harnesses the natural benefits of 100% pure merino wool. Featuring icebreaker’s ZoneKnit™body mapping technology that actively regulates body temperature during high-output activity, this comfy jacket features an ultra-fine merino yarn for incredible softness, and quilted three-layer insulation on the front for cool-weather warmth. The ribbed collar, cuffs and hem provide a stylish finish.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker ZoneKnit Insulated Knit Bomber - Mens
